segments.text: Excuse me , can you tell me the name of the book you read ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Harry Potter ? Is that book funny ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , the language itself is not so funny , but you can imagine the scene , that's funny .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever read this book before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but my little brother likes it very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really a good book . You will like it too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll try to read it . Actually , I like literature very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that sounds like a scholar . By the way , who's your favorite writer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . Pride and Prejudice is my favorite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like it too . But Sense and Sensibility is my favorite .
segments.speaker: S1
